name: Chemy
description:
Chemy is game game where the player is a 60 year-old scientist named Daniel Liech working for an organization called ECCTF (Earth’s Common Crisis Task Force). The ECCTF’s mission is to discover an alternate energy source for fossil fuels, they discover a new planet named Laviticus through a network of portals and send scientists, Chemys, to explore it.

The player will experience jumping puzzles where he has to coordinate the use of chemical elements with his hook and fusing more than one chemical so he is able to proceed further in the game.

- Walk (a/w/s/d); - Sprint(shift); - Jump(space); - grapple(e)-> works in the ; - chance bullet(mouse wheel or alpha numbers 1,2 e 3); - normal bullet (left mouse); -special bullet (right mouse): - jelly--> put a jelly on the floor and the player jump higher. - liquid nitrogen--> put a ice board on the floor and the player walks faster; - sulphur--> erase doors and other special bullets in the world as well.
x- upper hook c - lower hook
q- advance the  dialogue
